summary: Culturally appropriate armors for the Khajiit in Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
First of all, I must confess that my inspiration for this mod is the wonderful [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31985/?]'Cultural Diversity' by MJHarper[/url]. I have used that mod in the past, but it requires something like 15 plugins for the whole package so I thought I would remake it with my own spin and a smaller number of plugins.

I did not reference Cultural Diversity during the making of this mod, so I probably have a different take on who wears what and I also have not covered Argonians or Dunmer in this mod so please consider downloading MJHarpers version too, either for the parts my mod doesn't cover, or because you prefer MJ's take on things.

[b][size=3]Features:[/size][/b]
 - Provides new outfits to all named Khajiit and randomised outfits for khajiit corpses and unnamed NPCs.
 - Rebalanced armor stats, recipes and prices, with tweaks to the slot assignment of some armor pieces to reduce clipping.
 - Armor is updated with keywords and conditions for full compatibility with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49791/?]Complete Crafting Overhaul[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/23390/?]Guard Dialogue Overhaul[/url]. It does not *require* either of those mods, but will work with them.
 - Armors are only craftable by Khajiit characters, but can be tempered by anyone.
[i]- Only 1 .esp file which replaces the ESP of the armor mods too.[/i]

[b][size=3]Installation Instructions:[/size][/b]

 1. Download and Install the following mods:
 - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/39983/?]Regal Huntsman by Dreamburrow[/url]
 - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24342/?]Regal Assassin by Dreamburrow[/url]
 - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25832/?]Crimson Ranger by Patobek[/url]
 - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12092/?]Cloaks of Skyrim by Nikinoodles[/url]

 2. Deactivate or remove the .esp files for Regal Huntsman, Regal Assassin and Crimson Ranger.
[i]Optionally you can deactivate Cloaks of Skyrim, I only need meshes and textures from it, not the .esp, but I recommend you keep it because its such a stellar mod.[/i]

 3. Install and activate Cultural Armors - Khajiit.esp 
[i] Remember to load after Complete Crafting Overhaul Remade, Immersive Armors and Immersive weapons! [/i]

 4. Enjoy! (And don't forget to endorse the used armors if you choose to endorse this mod!)

[b][size=3]Compatibility[/size][/b]

Like almost all my mods, this requires the Unofficial Skyrim Patch.
This mod is highly compatible with others, except those that edit the NPC records of Khajiit. 
Respectful requests for patches will be taken into consideration for updates.

[b]Future Plans:[/b]
- Unique loot table for Khajiit instead of the generic 'upperclass loot'.
 - Khajiit Weapons
 - Versions for other races
 - Versions for various factions
 - Patches for Inconsequential NPC's and Interesting NPC's.


[b]Notes: [/b]
This is not a simple 'merged plugin'. I have gone through by hand and edited almost all of the records from the original mods. I've also deleted some things and made some pretty extreme changes to the stats and naming conventions of the armors. If you don't like my changes please use Cultural Diversity.

[b][size=3]If you like this mod, consider these:[/size][/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51566/?]Servants in Livery: Stewards Uniforms[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52436/?]Mine Foremen Sell Ore[/url]

[b][size=2]Other Mods by me:[/size][/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51886/?]USKP Patch for TK Children[/url]
[url= http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51860/?]Freckle Face for TK Children[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52671/?]Detailed TreeLOD for Realistic Aspens
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58622/?]Higher Res East Empire Trading Company Sign with Stencil Fix[/url]
